WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for logging this issue. We've moved to a new codebase on GitHub; please try your issue against the new compiler (once possible) and log an issue on the GitHub site if it still reproduces.
WorkItem.Description: When intellisense shows a function with "someVar: typeof {sometype}" as a parameter, it expands all properties of the type "sometype" into the popup instead of the type name, which is not appropriate.  It is expect that only the specified type name is shown, otherwise the signature displayed is highly confusing.
WorkItem.Summary: typeof {sometype} as parameter expands in intellisense
